website_summaries.verdict: Huge set for up to 20 players. Also ships with 10 field marking cones for a good value.
pros: You'll receive enough flags and belts for 20 players (two teams of 10)
Allows for large teams or allows subs to have their own flags
All items fit into a convenient carrying case
Belts will fit either kids or adults with D-ring closures
cons: Each belt only holds two flags instead of three
May not fit larger waists well

customer_reviews.title: When you get tagged with this flag football set, you know you're tagged.
customer_reviews.text: I have a group of children and young people who are a challenge to keep honest in their games. They never seen to have gotten tagged no matter who says they did. They are also difficult to find games they like. I struck on getting your flag football set and a game called capture the flag, and both of my problems were solved. When you get tagged with the flag football set, you know you're tagged.
customer_reviews.author: Micjo

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Great set for adults. I am a 38 waist and these worked great for me. 3 flags per belt and they attach very well.
customer_reviews.author: David burns

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: We use these at our sports camp. Work great for our kids and stay on really well. Very sturdy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Mears

customer_reviews.title: Great Gear!
customer_reviews.text: So far we have had 3 flag football games and they have held up very nicely. pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Choleric Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Fits all ages
customer_reviews.text: Has 3 flags , they fit my entire flag football students , ranging from ages 6-16 The cones are a plus
customer_reviews.author: victoria bautista

customer_reviews.title: My reasons for buying a set was the good value and sturdiness that I found with this set
customer_reviews.text: I am an elementary school teacher and I bought this set for my after school flag football program. My reasons for buying a set was the good value and sturdiness that I found with this set. When you are a teacher you must find the biggest bang for your buck and I did.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Bechtle

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Great value! Just make sure they'll work for your purpose.
customer_reviews.text: If these are used for a very active, outside game, be prepared for a significant loss of flags :-P ...especially if it's at all damp (i.e. in the evening). Overall they're great...would be good for flag football. But, for capture the flag in the woods they were found wanting.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Online Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Great package for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great package for a great price. These are well made and we will get many years of use from them.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great deal. Good Quality. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good deal. 20 flag sets overall. Flags attached through Velcro. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: LROD from AZ

customer_reviews.title: Probably a junior set, not meant for adults...
customer_reviews.text: Was told it would fit up to a 40 inch waist, so I purchased them. The belts I received were only about 34 inches long, nowhere near what I was told. For the money I spent, 20 belts is a fair deal, but not when you are told one thing and receive another. The amount of belts in the kit is the only reason I give this 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: The flag football set is great -- very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The flag football set is great -- very sturdy. The mesh storage/carrying bag is flimsy -- 2 months old and has two holes in it.
customer_reviews.author: mm

customer_reviews.title: Great item for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday present for my friend’s son who turned 8 and he loves it! They play all of the time in the front yard. The flags are easy to clip on and don’t break.
customer_reviews.author: Kara M. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good, high quality product. And, it arrived a day before the scheduled delivery date. Thank you, Slight Edge.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Duran

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, Hours of Fun
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my sons 9th birthday party. The kids had hours of fun! Great Quality and very easy to put back together!! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lacy

customer_reviews.title: Great product - my boy have a blast playing flag football.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this flag football set for my sons birthday party. It is so well constructed that it will last far longer than my 11-year-old son's flag football career.
customer_reviews.author: James N.

customer_reviews.title: Belts don't work well
customer_reviews.text: Good value, but after just a few uses the belts folder over on themselves and didn't stay secured on the clasps. I wouldn't buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice product
customer_reviews.text: easy to use classic d-ring belt with quality velcro attached flags. bang for the buck can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... my son’s flag football birthday party and they are great. Fully adjustable for any size child
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son’s flag football birthday party and they are great. Fully adjustable for any size child.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S.

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend this product to any one looking to have fun with family and friends.👌👍
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product good quality. Had a blast with them on Easter Day at the park
customer_reviews.author: E.Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They came just as expected and worked great for our Turkey Bowl on Thanksgiving Day
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for beginner boys
customer_reviews.text: Great for my two boys who are first time flag football players. Decent quality and sturdy enough.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer presnal

customer_reviews.title: Nice costume for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my six-year-old son who is 45 inches tall and somewhere around 45 pounds. Perfect fit. Good costume.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good for practice
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to use for practice for our 8 year old flag football team. The flags themselves and the belt are sturdy and the velcro has appropriate strength. I wish the belt loops were easier to use, the kids have a little trouble with them.
customer_reviews.author: Cinstress

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. These were great for our flag football team.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Lyons

product_meta.title: Unlimited Potential Tag Belts, Flag Football Belts, Flag Football Kits
product_meta.description:
UNLEASH YOUR UNLIMITED POTENTIAL WITH TAG BELTS THAT LAST

Durability You’ll Love

Complement the most competitive of flag football games with a tag belt designed to bring on the durability. We know just how 
intense flag football can get. That’s why we’ve crafted our belts to handle all the action. Unlike others that rip with an enthusiastic
yank, ours are made using extra-strong webbing to keep tearing at bay. And unlike others with overly-complicated connectors 
that fail over time, the flags on ours are attached to the belt by means of strong, trusty hook-and-loop fasteners. So even during the umpteenth 
game, the flags will remain attached to the belt as the players whisk and dash across the field, only coming off when snatched
away by a worthy competitor.

Designed for Versatility

Whether it’s a team of third-graders or thirty-year-olds, Unlimited Potential flag football belts are thoughtfully designed to easily fit 
around their waists. Simply adjust the metal clasp for a secure fit and never have to worry about the belt falling off in the middle 
of a game. And we’ve treated you to great value with our 20, 14 or 10 pack football flag set options; 10 blue/ 10 red, 7 blue/ 7 red or 5 blue/ 5 red sets. 

Here’s what sets out flag football belts apart from the rest:


 - Made using anti-tear webbing for impressive durability.

 - Flags attached by strong hook-and-loop fasteners for reliable performance.

 - Adjustable belt securely fits both kids and adults.

 - Comes with a great value selection; 20, 14 or 10 flag belts.

 - Backed by our 100% customer satisfaction guarantee.

Click ‘Add to Cart’ for a flag football set designed to fuel the fun with thoughtful design and uncompromising quality!
feature_bullets: SET OF FLAGS: Get the Unlimited Potential football flag set including 5 red and 5 blue flags, 6 goal-line cones, flags with attachment closures, flag football rules and a bag to put them all in for convenient storage and portability.

DURABLE FOOTBALL EQUIPMENT: The flag football equipment is made from durable nylon material with metallic D-ring closures on the flag football belts and sturdy grips to ensure that the equipment can withstand vigorous play and can last for a long time.

UNIVERSALLY COMPATIBLE: The Unlimited Potential flag football belts can be adjusted to fit people from the age of 7 years old and above thanks to its universally fitting design. This allows the whole family to get in on the action and enjoy some wholesome quality time.

ENJOY REALISTIC GAME PLAY: with the accompanying set of flag football rules and all the necessary equipment, anyone can enjoy hours of quality, realistic fun with the Unlimited Potential complete set of flags for flag football.

100 % MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: Enjoy a 100 % money back guarantee when you buy the best flag set for flag football by Unlimited Potential. Expect nothing but premium quality, long-lasting durability and hours of wholesome fun with your family and friends. Click ‘Add to Cart’ now!
